title: Amexio Theme Switcher
description: Theme Switcher component shows out of box 80+ material design themes
componentDescription: Theme switcher component shows out of box 80+ material design themes. It also allows user to select the theme and check it

gridData.name: test-mode
gridData.description: This will disable theme test button

gridData.name: relative
gridData.description: Place amexio theme switcher to relative position

gridData.name: horizontal-position
gridData.description: Horizontal position of theme selector panel (left/right)

gridData.name: vertical-position
gridData.description: Vertical position of theme selector panel (top/bottom)

gridData.name: button-type
gridData.description: button type for theme selector panel(floatingbutton/button)

gridData.name: Tab
gridData.description: Navigates on Tab click to the next element.

gridData.name: Shift+Tab
gridData.description: Navigates on Shift+Tab click to the previous element.

gridData.name: Left Arrow
gridData.description: Navigates focus from current active element to the previous active element.

gridData.name: Down Arrow
gridData.description: Navigates focus from current active element to the previous active element.

gridData.name: Right Arrow
gridData.description: Navigates focus from current active element to the previous active element.

gridData.name: Up Arrow
gridData.description: Navigates focus from current active element to the next active element.

gridData.name: Enter
gridData.description: On Enter click selects the focuses data
